attributes.additional_details: I believe Sage and the government have overstepped what should be their authority during the pandemic. As such, I feel that the governance of pre-pandemic should be re-instated.
attributes.background: End all coronavirus virus legislation and revert to the normal system of governance and law prior to March 2020.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
